Print Inventory Overstock Report-PDF/XLS Odoo apps

This odoo apps helps to print Inventory Overstock Reports on odoo according to given duration of last sale and advance stock. This Odoo module also shows product Overstock Quantity and Product Overstock Value with Duration on printed pdf and excel both format. This reports also shows Daily Sales Average and Product of Last Sales and Purchase. You can able to generate and print product over stock reports on pdf and excel both format.

Looking for All sort of warehouse stock reports Odoo Apps, please check below module link
All in one Inventory Stocks Reports Odoo Apps.

Features

Incoming and Outgoing Stock.

Get incoming and outgoing stock according to given duration of last sale and advance stock.

Sale Duration(Days) and Advance Stock Duration(Days).

User can specify duration of last sale and advance stock for Overstock report.

Average Of Daily Sale.

Get average of daily sale according to given duration of last sale.

Last Sale and Recent Purchase.

Get detail of last sale and recent purchase according to given duration.

Excel and PDF Report.

Generate report in multiple form like excel and pdf.

Overstock Quantity and Overstock Value.

Get overstock quantity and overstock value according given duration of last sale and advance stock.
Demo Request Video Tutorial

Menu for Inventory Overstock Report

User can open wizard view for Inventory Overstock report.

All Products and All Warehouses

User can generate overstock report for all products and all warehouses.

Specific Warehouse

User can generate overstock report for specific warehouses and all products will be considered.

Specific Products

User can generate overstock report for specific products and all Warehouses will be considered.

Specific Products and Specific Warehouses

User can generate overstock report for specific products and specific Warehouses.

Excel Report File

User can download excel report file.

All Products and All Warehouses Excel Report

Generated excel report for all products and all Warehouses.

Specific Warehouse Excel Report

Generated excel report for specific warehouses considered all products.

Specific Products Excel Report

Generated excel report for specific products and all warehouses considered.

Specific Warehouses and Specific Products Excel Report

Generated excel report for specific Warehouses and specific products.

All Products and All Warehouses PDF Report

Generated PDF report for all products and all warehouses.

Specific Warehouses and All Products PDF Report

Generated PDF report for Specific warehouses considered with all products.

Specific Products and All Warehouses PDF Report

Generated PDF report for specific products considered with all Warehouses.

Specific Warehouses and Specific Products PDF Report

Generated PDF report for specific products and specific warehouses.
